mapper.select: select * from tyerp.TB_GOS_SALEINVOICEAPPLYsum a where (a.opid = #{opid} or #{opid} = 'ZIY00006347') and a.BILLSTATE = 1 and a.deleteflag = 0 and not exists(select b.RELATEDBILLID from tyerp.TB_GOS_FINANCE_SALEBILLNEWSUM b where b.branchid = a.branchid and a.billid = b.relatedbillid) and a.billingdate > To_Date('2019-8-1', 'yyyy-mm-dd') order by a.CREATETIME desc
